title: MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack, TSA Large Travel Backpack with Lunch Box, Anti-Theft Work Business Carry On with USB Port, Water Resistant Durable College Computer Backpack for Men Women
descriptions:
MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack with Insulated Cooler Compartment, USB Port, TSA-Friendly, Water-Resistant

Highlights:
- Fits laptops up to 17.3 inches: Securely holds 17.3, 15.6, 15, 14, and 13.3 inch laptops.
- Built-in insulated cooler: Dedicated foldable lunch compartment (11.4 x 5.5 x 6.9 inches) holds up to 10 cans; water-resistant aluminum lining keeps food warm or drinks cold for 3–5 hours.
- Organized storage: Spacious main zipper pocket for clothes, files, and papers; 2 small front pockets with slot and key hook organizers; 2 side pockets for umbrellas or tissues.
- Travel/TSA friendly: Unfolds 90–180 degrees for quick laptop screening; luggage strap secures to suitcase handles; flight approved design.
- On-the-go charging: External USB port with included charging cable; power bank required (not included).
- Comfortable carry: Padded, breathable mesh on shoulder straps, back panel, and handle for all-day comfort.
- Anti-theft protection: Hidden back pocket for passport, wallet, and ID.
- Durable and water-resistant: High-density polyester resists rips, scratches, and light rain.

Specifications:
- Overall dimensions: 18.1"H x 12.9"L x 8.5"W.
- Cooler compartment: 11.4"H x 5.5"W x 6.9"D, up to 10 cans capacity, foldable when not in use.
- Materials: High-density polyester fabric; water-resistant aluminum cooler lining.

Ideal For:
- Teachers, business professionals, commuters, travelers, and picnics or day trips.

Great Gift:
- Makes a practical gift for Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year.

What’s Included:
- Backpack with insulated lunch compartment
- Built-in USB port and charging cable (power bank not included)

Why You’ll Love It:
- Combines a full-size laptop backpack with a dedicated lunch cooler to reduce extra bags.
- Smart organization, TSA-ready design, and durable water-resistant materials keep you prepared and comfortable wherever you go.
